name: 放置勇者：远征/Idle Heroes:Odyssey
description:
After the heroes defeated the dragon, why embarked on the road of expedition again?
Want to know the latest development of the game, please join

25 featured heroes debut

"No-brainer! Heroes" popular heroes appeared again, updated new skills on the basis of inheriting the hero settings, and added new powerful heroes to the battle! Each hero has unique characteristics and advantages. Strategies are matched with heroes. Reasonably use fetter to improve the team's combat power and defeat all monsters!

Up to 180 treasures equipment

Inherit "No-brainer! Heroes" ‘ s highly praised treasure collocation playing. Each treasure has its exclusive special effects, understand the skills and characteristics of heroes, choose and match treasure equipment reasonably, and find the strongest routine genre.

Newly-developed skill combination

Each hero have at least 30+ skills. Active skills as basic skills, can be improved by passive skills, changing trigger logic, attacking targets, additional effects or characteristics. You can concentrate the passive skills on an active skill to obtain the ultimate skill of destruction, you can strengthen the basic attributes to be a veritable muscle man, or you can improve aura skills to become a pendant toolmaker. Diversified skill combinations can construct how many genres of heroes, they are waiting for you to dig.

Extremely rich level gameplay

As a leader, how do you assign the hero to adventure in different levels?
1 Wasteland expedition: open up wasteland-Opening up wasteland needs hard power, and cultivating on-hook is the key.
2 Hang up expedition: find out the team configuration with the highest output efficiency, don't forget to bring the people that open the treasure box.
3 Training ground: a good place to quickly upgrade the hero level to awaken reborn heroes.
4 Mine: Equip your heroes with miner work permits and send them to mine. Treasures such as gold picks and miner hats can double your hero's efficiency.
5 Jungle: Heroes equipped with adventure certificates can enter jungle and search treasure. Of course, not all heroes are qualified to obtain the Adventure Certificate.
6 Double mysterious realm: separately only allow men or women to enter. Do you want to match your strongest all-girl lineup?

Featured town work

You can not only send heroes for expeditions and adventures, and you can also arrange jobs for them in towns. Arranging heroes into buildings can provide different bonus reward to buildings. There are castles, taverns, equipment shops, smith, merchants, training grounds and other buildings in the towns. Rich town management can help you improve the team.
